events.message: I was involved in a car collision last night and need to file a claim for the damages sustained to my vehicle.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the details about the vehicle collision reported.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle and assist you with your auto accident claim process.
Your claim regarding the car accident has been acknowledged and is now under review by our processing team.
Please provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and any witness statements to proceed with the claim.
I have submitted the required police report, images of the damage, and a witness statement as requested.
The investigation into the circumstances and liability surrounding the auto accident has officially begun.
The investigation has concluded confirming the details of the accident and verifying all submitted evidence.
We have proposed a settlement offer for the damages to your vehicle based on the assessment report.
The customer has provided positive feedback regarding the handling and proposed settlement of the case.
The auto accident claim has been approved for payment as per the agreed settlement terms.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been processed and issued to your registered bank account.
Your auto accident claim has been successfully closed following the payment issuance and claim resolution.
The claim files and all associated documents have been archived for future reference if needed.
